name: Kavat Genetic Code
description: Contains the genetic code sequence of a Kavat.

name: Genetic Code Template
description: Copies the dominant genes of a pet onto the template. This can then be used to increase the chances that traits from the original pet will carry across to a newborn clone.

name: Incubator Power Core
description: This device facilitates the growth of a Kubrow clone, from birth to puppyhood.

name: Nai-Zhen Kubrow Collar
description: Records the genetic memory and DNA sequence of a Kubrow, allowing it to be reconstructed in the Incubator.

name: Dna Stabilizers
description: Contains 6 DNA Stabilizers to maintain the health of a Kubrow.

name: Vapor Specter Regiment
description: An army composed of vapor-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for one conflict.

name: Force Specter Regiment
description: An army composed of force-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for three conflicts.

name: Cosmic Specter Regiment
description: An army composed of cosmic-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for four conflicts.

name: Phase Specter Regiment
description: An army composed of phase-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for two conflicts.

name: Hemocyte Cystolith
description: Torn from the bile duct of a fallen Hemocyte.

name: Brilliant Eidolon Shard
description: Rare shard gained from capturing the Sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon. Use it to gain Focus or to unbind Way-bound focus nodes.

name: Radiant Eidolon Shard
description: Rare shard gained from capturing the Sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon. Use it to gain Focus or to unbind Way-bound focus nodes.

name: Eidolon Shard
description: Shard gained from the sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon.

name: Condroc Wing
description: The talon on a condroc's wing is is sharp enough to tear through bone.

name: Cetus Wisp
description: Strange stone lifeforms that call the Plains home. They are a rare find, clustering together, floating above a patch of ground they've taken an inexplicable interest in. They are an enigma.

name: Maprico
description: This hardy fruit is thick-skinned to withstand harsh conditions, concealing a mouthful of sweet pulp within.

name: Kuaka Spinal Claw
description: The sinew from the Kuaka's spinal claws can be tanned to make a resilient and flexible leather.

name: Grokdrul
description: A noxious mix of polyssachharides and long-chain polymers, Grokdrul is a standard chemical used in Grineer manufacturing.

name: Iradite
description: A valuable mineral found on the Plains.

name: Nistlepod
description: Used by the Nistlebrush to trap and kill prey.

name: Intact Sentient Core
description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.

name: Flawless Sentient Core
description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.

name: Exceptional Sentient Core
description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.

name: Charc Electroplax
description: Harvested by the Ostron as a catalyst used in their synthetics.

name: Goopolla Spleen
description: Used in Ostron remedies to purify toxins.

name: Murkray Liver
description: An ingredient used in Ostron cooking and medicines.

name: Sharrac Teeth
description: These will often adorn ceremonial garb or as a reagent for synthetics.

name: Karkina Antenna
description: Ground into a powder this substance can make fires burn hotter for a brief amount of time.

name: Mawfish Bones
description: The bones of the Mawfish are carved by the Ostron to produce onaments and tools.

name: Khut-Khut Venom Sac
description: The poison is used by the Ostrons to cure leather and as a reagent to produce an embalming fluid.

name: Yogwun Stomach
description: Once cleaned and tanned this organ can be turned into a durable leather.

name: Tralok Eyes
description: The Ostron boil these into a jelly which forms a strong adhesive when it dries.

name: Mortus Horn
description: The horn of a Mortus Lungfish is ground down into a powder and used by the Ostrons in herbal remedies.

name: Fish Meat
description: Used as a source of food and to create bait for predatory fish.

name: Fish Oil
description: Used to create absolvents that purify gems.

name: Fish Scales
description: A material used in tailoring clothes and cultivating synthetics.

name: Seram Beetle Shell
description: This thick shell is used by Ostrons to manufacture tools and weapons.

name: Norg Brain
description: An Ostron delicacy.

name: Cuthol Tendrils
description: Ostrons extract the toxin and apply it to their weapons when hunting animals.

name: Charc Eel
description: Discharges electricity from luminous glands along its flanks to stun its prey.

name: Charc Eel
description: Discharges electricity from luminous glands along its flanks to stun its prey.

name: Charc Eel
description: Discharges electricity from luminous glands along its flanks to stun its prey.

name: Goopolla
description: A predatory fish that is attracted to the scent of blood.

name: Goopolla
description: A predatory fish that is attracted to the scent of blood.

name: Goopolla
description: A predatory fish that is attracted to the scent of blood.

name: Murkray
description: A cunning hunter that hides within the mud at the bottom of the ocean and ambushes passing prey.

name: Murkray
description: A cunning hunter that hides within the mud at the bottom of the ocean and ambushes passing prey.

name: Murkray
description: A cunning hunter that hides within the mud at the bottom of the ocean and ambushes passing prey.

name: Sharrac
description: While rarely venturing from the deepest waters of the plains, the Sharrac is a fearsome predator who will prey on unwary Ostrons swimming alone.

name: Sharrac
description: While rarely venturing from the deepest waters of the plains, the Sharrac is a fearsome predator who will prey on unwary Ostrons swimming alone.

name: Sharrac
description: While rarely venturing from the deepest waters of the plains, the Sharrac is a fearsome predator who will prey on unwary Ostrons swimming alone.

name: Karkina
description: A crustacean that hunts during the twilight hours.

name: Karkina
description: A crustacean that hunts during the twilight hours.

name: Karkina
description: A crustacean that hunts during the twilight hours.

name: Mawfish
description: Its gaping maw allows it to scoop up smaller fish as it swims by them.

name: Mawfish
description: Its gaping maw allows it to scoop up smaller fish as it swims by them.

name: Mawfish
description: Its gaping maw allows it to scoop up smaller fish as it swims by them.

name: Khut-Khut
description: A poisonous fish protected by a hardened carapace around its skull.

name: Khut-Khut
description: A poisonous fish protected by a hardened carapace around its skull.

name: Khut-Khut
description: A poisonous fish protected by a hardened carapace around its skull.

name: Yogwun
description: This slow fish meanders through the waters and is often preyed upon by larger predators.

name: Yogwun
description: This slow fish meanders through the waters and is often preyed upon by larger predators.

name: Yogwun
description: This slow fish meanders through the waters and is often preyed upon by larger predators.

name: Tralok
description: Strong, predatory fish with eyes that can pierce the darkest shadows.

name: Tralok
description: Strong, predatory fish with eyes that can pierce the darkest shadows.

name: Tralok
description: Strong, predatory fish with eyes that can pierce the darkest shadows.

name: Mortus Lungfish
description: Displays blood-spattered pattern on its scales and has its ribs exposed through open cavities along both flanks. When predators approach it lies still at the bottom of the sand banks, disguised as a carcass in hopes of being ignored.

name: Mortus Lungfish
description: Displays blood-spattered pattern on its scales and has its ribs exposed through open cavities along both flanks. When predators approach it lies still at the bottom of the sand banks, disguised as a carcass in hopes of being ignored.

name: Mortus Lungfish
description: Displays blood-spattered pattern on its scales and has its ribs exposed through open cavities along both flanks. When predators approach it lies still at the bottom of the sand banks, disguised as a carcass in hopes of being ignored.

name: Boot
description: Synthetic fibers and a molded foam insole were the basis for what was once a robust and comfortable combat boot. Now, it's a home for tiny aquatic organisms.

name: Glappid
description: The Glappid is a scavenger that feasts on the remains of dead fish. It has formed a symbiotic bond with the Seram Beetle which extracts and feeds upon any toxins ingested by the Glappid.

name: Glappid
description: The Glappid is a scavenger that feasts on the remains of dead fish. It has formed a symbiotic bond with the Seram Beetle which extracts and feeds upon any toxins ingested by the Glappid.

name: Glappid
description: The Glappid is a scavenger that feasts on the remains of dead fish. It has formed a symbiotic bond with the Seram Beetle which extracts and feeds upon any toxins ingested by the Glappid.

name: Norg
description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

name: Norg
description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

name: Norg
description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

name: Cuthol
description: A grotesque crustacean that produces a potent, paralyzing toxin from its tentacles.

name: Cuthol
description: A grotesque crustacean that produces a potent, paralyzing toxin from its tentacles.

name: Cuthol
description: A grotesque crustacean that produces a potent, paralyzing toxin from its tentacles.

name: Ayatan Sah Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Ayatan Ayr Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Ayatan Orta Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Ayatan Vaya Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Ayatan Piv Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Ayatan Anasa Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Ayatan Valana Sculpture
description: This kinetic Orokin sculpture springs to life when filled with Ayatan Stars. It may also be a source of Endo.

name: Tear Azurite
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Azurite
description: A blue gem layered with impurities.

name: Esher Devar
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Devar
description: A cloudy crystal.

name: Pyrotic Alloy
description: Pyrol that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Pyrol
description: A tarnished, brittle metal.

name: Coprite Alloy
description: Coprun that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Coprun
description: A soft, malleable metal.

name: Radian Sentirum
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Sentirum
description: A rare Eidolon Gem, created from the fossilized blood of an ancient Sentient.

name: Heart Nyth
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Nyth
description: A rare local Gem, formed when the gas known as Breath of the Eidolon becomes trapped in molten iradite.

name: Star Crimzian
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Crimzian
description: A blood-red gem.

name: Auroxium Alloy
description: Auron that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Auron
description: A brilliant, dense and conductive metal.

name: Marquise Veridos
description: Polished and cut to perfection.

name: Veridos
description: A highly reflective, green gem.

name: Fersteel Alloy
description: Ferros that has been forged into a stronger metal.

name: Ferros
description: A resilient metal that is hardened by the inpurities within it.

name: Nitain Extract
description: Each vial is produced by the painstaking expression of billions of rare, ocean-vent dwelling microorganisms.

name: Alloy Plate
description: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.

name: Alpha Corruptor
description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

name: Orokin Archive
description: Archive detailing the locations of hidden Archwing technology

name: Argon Crystal
description: Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the void.

name: Proof Fragment
description: One part of a long lost mathematical proof.

name: Beta Corruptor
description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

name: Lephantis Nav Coordinate
description: Coordinate used to locate the Lephantis.

name: Circuits
description: Various electronic components.

name: /Lotus/Language/Items/Clancreator
description: /Lotus/Language/Items/ClanCreatorDesc

name: Control Module
description: Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.

name: Cryotic
description: Usually found in extreme sub-zero environments, Cryotic instantly freezes anything it contacts.

name: Simulacrum Access Key
description:
Grants access to the Simulacrum.
In the Simulacrum you can face mimeographs of enemies you have fully researched with the Codex.

name: Tethra Data Fragments
description: Intercepted encrypted fragment of Grineer communications.

name: Breath Of The Eidolon
description: A gas found solely on the plains of Eidolon, refined to its purest form.

name: Synthula
description: Distilled fuel for stims.

name: Ferrite
description: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.

name: Greater Focus Lens
description: A Greater Lens that channels Affinity into Focus for one of the five Tenno Ways.

name: Eidolon Lens
description: An enhanced Greater Lens that has been infused with Breath of the Eidolon.

name: Forma
description: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Companions or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Unranked. This can only be used on Level 30 Warframes, Companions and Weapons.

name: Gallium
description: Soft metal used in microelectronics and energy weapons.

name: Javlok Capacitor
description: Used in the construction of Javloks

name: Vay Hek Nav Coordinate
description: Coordinate used to locate Councilor Vay Hek.

name: Mutalist Alad V Nav Coordinate
description: Nav coordinates of Alad V's Infestation Research Ship

name: Pulsating Tubercles
description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

name: Infected Palpators
description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

name: Chitinous Husk
description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

name: Severed Bile Sac
description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

name: Kuva
description: A mysterious red fluid coveted by the Grineer Queens.

name: Cross-Matrix Widget
description: Chance for each scan with the Synthesis Scanner to count as two scans.

name: Data-Parse Widget
description: Synthesis Scanner will now show target enemy weaknesses and resistances.

name: Sol-Battery Widget
description: Recharges Synthesis Scanner charges.

name: Vector-Thread Widget
description: Reduces the time required to scan a target with the Synthesis Scanner.

name: /Lotus/Language/Items/Limbocodename
description: /Lotus/Language/Items/LimboCodeDesc

name: Orokin Cipher
description: This device is used to bypass Orokin encryptions.

name: Morphics
description: An amorphous solid. Possibly Orokin technology.

name: Nano Spores
description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.

name: Nav Coordinate
description: Coordinate used to locate lost ships.

name: Neural Sensors
description: Implanted neural-link for controlling augmentations. Grineer design.

name: Neurodes
description: Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.

name: Omega Isotope
description: Produced by a Fomorian’s power core, these particles only appear on or around planets where a Fomorian is present.

name: Orokin Catalyst
description: Orokin modification technology used to super-charge weaponry. Doubles the available Mod Capacity on a Weapon.

name: Orokin Cell
description: Ancient energy cell from the Orokin era.

name: Orokin Reactor
description: Reactor used to super-charge Warframes. Doubles the available Mod Capacity on a Warframe, Archwing, and Companions.

name: Oxium
description: Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin.

name: Plastids
description: A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.

name: Polymer Bundle
description: A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.

name: Orokin Ducats
description: Currency exchanged for Prime components and used to purchase items from the Void Trader.

name: Cryptographic Alu
description: Excess circuitry disposed of during the Razorback manufacturing process, these components only appear in the vicinity of high level outer-orbit Corpus facilities after a Razorback Armada has been launched.

name: Rubedo
description: A jagged crystalline ore. Gives off radiant energy.

name: Salvage
description: High value metals collected from war salvage.

name: Stable Corruptor
description: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.

name: Antiserum Injector Fragment
description: A component of the Antiserum Injector

name: Tellurium
description: This rare metal is foreign to the Origin System and can only be found in asteroids that have made the long journey from other stars.

name: Exilus Adapter
description: Fuses with a Warframe to create an additional Exilus Mod Slot.

name: Delta Beacon
description: Locator beacon broadcasting on the delta frequency

name: Gamma Beacon
description: Locator beacon broadcasting on the gamma frequency

name: Kappa Beacon
description: Locator beacon broadcasting on the kappa frequency

name: Omega Beacon
description: Locator beacon broadcasting on the Omega frequency

name: Void Traces
description: A substance used to increase the power within Relics.

name: Sunlight Threshcone
description: This common plant can only be found during the day.

name: Moonlight Threshcone
description: This common plant can only be found at night.

name: Ruk'S Claw
description: This plant was introduced to arid regions across the Origin System, for its ability to collect moisture in harsh environments.

name: Vestan Moss
description: One of the few known plant species able to thrive on asteroids in deep space.

name: Cerulean Fungus Extract
description: Extracted from a Cerulean Fungus colony.

name: Sunlight Jadeleaf
description: This rare plant can only be found during the day.

name: Moonlight Jadeleaf
description: This rare plant can only be found at night.

name: Sunlight Dragonlily
description: This uncommon plant can only be found during the day.

name: Moonlight Dragonlily
description: This uncommon plant can only be found at night.

name: Frostleaf
description: This resilient plant provides a natural food source in frigid areas of the Origin system.

name: Dusklight Sarracenia
description: This robust, carnivorous plant has adapted to conditions in polluted waters.

name: Lunar Pitcher
description: This carnivorous plant can be found growing in the wilderness on Lua.

name: Mutagen Mass
description: This living mass can produce weaponized toxins for weaponry.

name: Mutagen Sample
description: These samples could advance our knowledge of biological research.

name: Detonite Injector
description: Detonite injectors are the basis for explosive and incendiary weapons.

name: Detonite Ampule
description: Researching the Detonite traces within could advance our weapon technology.

name: Corpus Cipher
description: A cipher used to decode Corpus intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY

name: Corpus Datamass
description: A Corpus datamass containing encrypted intel. Crafting component required to create a CORPUS VOID KEY

name: Fieldron
description: ClanTech weaponized containment field to contain super-heated substances.

name: Fieldron Sample
description: This destroyed Fieldron could further research into super-heated containment fields.

name: Noggle Statue - Baro Ki'Teer
description: A wobbly embodiment of grace and distinction.

name: Charc Eel Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Goopolla Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Murkray Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Sharrac Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Karkina Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Mawfish Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Khut-Khut Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Yogwun Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Tralok Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Mortus Lungfish Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Gilded Illumination
description: Illumination, crafted by Ostron glassworkers, fashioned and gilded to aesthetic perfection.

name: Caged Condroc
description: A bird of prey to accompany you aboard the Orbiter.

name: Temple Flesh
description: A small sample of sacred Temple flesh, iconic export of Cetus.

name: Reclamator Balloon
description: One of Cetus' signature sights, in miniature.

name: Xartaan Lamp
description: Turquoise glass suspended in a handmade gilded basket, filled with bioluminescence.

name: Caged Kuaka
description: A small rodent of Earthly origin to keep you company aboard the Orbiter.

name: Thousand-Year Fish Statuette
description: A glass carving depicting the colossal Thousand-Year Fish of Ostron legend.

name: Glappid Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Norg Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Cuthol Trophy
description: A trophy of a prized catch.

name: Pedestal Prime
description: Behold, the singular vision of a great artist and the life’s work of a master craftsmen. An artifact so refined, so imbued with the finest material that it has no equal in this system. This is the plinth that all others aspire to be. This is Pedestal Prime.

name: Display - Tennocon 2018
description: Bestowed upon those who joined together in celebration at TennoCon 2018.

name: Arsenal Segment
description: Install this segment in order to enable the Arsenal within your orbiter.

name: Arsenal Segment
description: Install this segment in order to enable the Arsenal within your orbiter.

name: Archwing Launcher Segment
description: Adds the Archwing Launcher to the foundry

name: Landing Craft Foundry Segment
description:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Foundry with the following features:
- Allows construction of Landing Craft- Allows construction of Air Support Charges
Equip Air Support Charges in your Loadout's Gear

name: Kavat Incubator Upgrade Segment
description: Allows the Incubator to breed Kavats.

name: Incubator Segment
description: Install this segment to enable the pet incubator within your Orbiter.

name: Nutrio Incubator Upgrade Segment
description:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Incubator with the following features:
- Stasis Recovery reduced to 30 mins- Stasis Recovery can be rushed with Credits- Reduced price of stabilizers- Egg incubation reduced by a day- Stabilizers last twice as long

name: Mod Fusion Segment
description: Install this segment to enable the Mod Fusion function within the MODS terminal of your Orbiter.

name: Mod Transmute Segment
description: Install this segment to enable the Mod Transmutation function within the MODS terminal of your Orbiter.

name: Medallion
description: Medallion of the Arbiters of Hexis syndicate. Can be traded in on relay syndicate hubs for additional standing.

description: A rare Orokin instrument.

description: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

description: Channels a greater amount of Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.

description: Channels a large amount of Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.
